ygData.subject: Re: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heehee! What the Levelquest people miss in their mad dash to win ! ... Want to hear some suspicions? I think Ged and his Girlfriend (not recalling he
ygData.messageBody:
>Finally someone else notices...I get sick of those messages that say
>something like, "We need to get rid of useless zones....like Kithicor"


Heehee! What the "Levelquest" people miss in their mad dash to "win"!

>I adventured there for more than a few levels, and I still get a kick out of
>that dark place...Have you ever met Kithicor himself? I saw him once by the
>cabin with the grizzley bears and the flag. He didn't say much...



Want to hear some suspicions?

I think Ged and his Girlfriend (not recalling he name) are either dead (we are talking to their
ghosts) or cursed. He (or she, likely she) may be a werewolf. I think they had a nice little house
in the Kithicor until it was burned down or destroyed in some manner.

That lake, that lake *sigh* there is something UP with it (besides two piranha).

Anyway we have a bunch of really weird data points about it, which might be random, but might NOT
be.

Truth is out there
:o)
Tszaaz
